questions_and_notes: How does this variable differ from  msftmzsmpa-Omon?  Should the standard name be "… y_overturning…" rather than "…meridional_overturning…"?  Should root name include "mz", rather than "my"?  Since it is stored on model levels, I don't think cell_methods needs to include "depth". check whether "sum" is correct for longitude. cell_methods should include "where sea"
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 1 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: longitude: sum (comment: basin sum [along zig-zag grid path]) depth: sum time: mean
long_name: Ocean Y Overturning Mass Streamfunction Due to Parameterized Submesoscale Advection
comment: Report only if there is a submesoscale eddy parameterization.
